thread.section_title: Verc Car Rental Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Verc Car Rental | verc.com | 4 of 5
thread.title: ELIZABETH
thread.title_full: Verc Car Rental reviewed by ELIZABETH

author: ELIZABETH
title: ELIZABETH
text: I needed a handicap vehicle to attend a wedding at the Cape. Verc was very helpful and had the perfect van for my husband and I to use. I attended my friend's son's wedding and it wouldn't have been possible since my husband is in a wheelchair. Great service! I highly recommend them.
